scripts.build: tsc && npm run minify && npm run deploy && npm run styles
scripts.build-windows: tsc && npm run minify-windows && npm run deploy-windows && npm run styles-windows
scripts.deploy: cp src/index.php dist/index.php && sed -i "s/{APP_JS_FILE}/app.$npm_package_version.min.js/g" dist/index.php && sed -i "s/{APP_VERSION}/$npm_package_version/g" dist/index.php && sed -i "s/{BASE_URL}/$npm_package_config_url/g" dist/index.php && sed -i "s/{BASE_SITE}/$npm_package_config_site/g" dist/index.php
scripts.deploy-windows: cp src/index.php dist/index.php && sed -i 's/{APP_JS_FILE}/app.%npm_package_version%.min.js/g' dist/index.php && sed -i 's/{APP_VERSION}/%npm_package_version%/g' dist/index.php && sed -i 's/{BASE_URL}/%npm_package_config_url%/g' dist/index.php && sed -i 's/{BASE_SITE}/%npm_package_config_site%/g' dist/index.php
